item.title: How I made: Stylized Heightmaps pt. 1
item.description: I’m going to be using the Java version of Processing, but feel free to use whatever you prefer. The same principles will apply. What are heightmaps? A heightmap is a raster image or more generally a grid that contains elevation data. Each value in the grid stores the height of the particular location. It’s usually visualized as a grayscale image, with black being the minimum height, and white the maximum.
